name: Electro Application
description:
When Electro is applied without dealing any DMG, the Elemental Reactions triggered will ignore DMG-dealing effects:
Overloaded: The target is forcibly switched to the next character
Superconduct: No effect
Electro-Charged: No effect
Quicken: Creates a [Catalyzing Field] that grants +1 DMG to the next 3 instances of Dendro/Electro DMG
descriptionraw:
When {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}Electro is applied without dealing any DMG, the Elemental Reactions triggered will ignore DMG-dealing effects:
